participant_1.background:
I'm going to be spending this weekend working on my juicing bar business and trying to figure out how to advertise it to my neighbors.
i am looking for krav maga classes near my home.
i live with my parents.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes spend hours whittling away at a piece of wood, even if it's not going to be very useful in the end.
I play basketball with my friends and enjoy going to concerts.
i like to paint.
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.
i play bass.

content.text: Hey there, how are you?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm working on a new business idea and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! What kind of business is it?
It's a juicing bar. I'm really passionate about juicing and I think it's a great way to get healthy.
That's a great idea! I love juicing too.
Me too! I'm so excited to get started.
I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my dog, experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks, and go to concerts.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to play basketball, paint, and go horseback riding.
Those all sound like great hobbies.
Thanks! I enjoy them a lot.
What kind of music do you like to listen to at concerts?
I like a variety of music, but I mostly listen to rock and alternative music.
Me too! I love going to concerts.
Me too! They're so much fun.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too
